<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that small stack changes could be implemented more efficiently</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;6&gt;</a>(Amount) &amp;&amp; STI.hasADDSUBIW()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are no fixed frame indexes during this stage it means there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are allocas present in the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ab4b44bc5aa744df4f8b70f971e8dcbf1">getNumObjects</a>() != MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ad8ccc7c575c4513731612b1d73b4bac0">getNumFixedObjects</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for the type of allocas present in the function. We only care</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// about fixed size allocas so do not give false positives if only</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0, e = MFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineframeinfo/#ac51e2d34abb79b72afef355fac525c76">getObjectIndexEnd</a>(); i != e; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ok fixed frame indexes present, now scan the function to see if they</span></CodeLine>
